result.eng: I got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ga: bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.orig: Bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin dom
result.html: bhuail an smaoineamh mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.
result.ponchtml: ḃuail an smaoineaṁ mé ar éirí ar maidin domI got the idea while getting up in the morning.

result.eng: I am always thinking of you.
result.ga: bím ag smaoineamh ort i gcónaí
result.orig: Bím ag smaoineamh ort i gcónaí
result.html: bím ag smaoineamh ort i gcónaíI am always thinking of you.
result.ponchtml: bím ag smaoineaṁ ort i gcónaíI am always thinking of you.

result.eng: He used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.
result.ga: mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadh
result.orig: Mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadh
result.html: mhaíodh sé gurbh é an féinoideachas a chuir ar a chumas aige smaointe neamhghnácha a cheapadhHe used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.
result.ponchtml: ṁaíoḋ sé gurḃ é an féinoideaċas a ċuir ar a ċumas aige smaointe neaṁġnáċa a ċeapaḋHe used to claim that it was self-instruction that enabled him to conceive unusual ideas.

result.eng: The brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ga: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.orig: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointe
result.html: Éilíonn gontacht na formáide 140 carachtar nach dtéann an scríbhneoir chun fadála ina chuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.
result.ponchtml: Éilíonn gontaċt na formáide 140 caraċtar naċ dtéann an scríḃneoir ċun fadála ina ċuid smaointeThe brevity of the format (140 characters) forces the writer to avoid verbosity in his thoughts.

result.eng: His wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ga: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.orig: Ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt air
result.html: ní raibh a bhean marbh ach cupla mí go rabhathas á rá i modh rúin go raibh sé ag smaoineamh ar cheann eile a tharraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.
result.ponchtml: ní raiḃ a ḃean marḃ aċ cupla mí go raḃaṫas á rá i moḋ rúin go raiḃ sé ag smaoineaṁ ar ċeann eile a ṫarraingt airHis wife was only dead for a couple of days when people started saying in secret that he was thinking of helping himself to a new one.

result.eng: Babaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ga: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.orig: Dar le Babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí é
result.html: dar le babaí gurbh é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aithne ach ní raibh dul aici smaoineamh cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
result.ponchtml: dar le babaí gurḃ é a ceart an glór cinn sin a aiṫne aċ ní raiḃ dul aici smaoineaṁ cá háit a gcuala sí éBabaí thought she should recognize that voice but couldn't remember where she had heard it.
